blog.name: in-hes-wildest-dreams
blog.title: Shadow Preacher
blog.description:
Hiya, I am Simona. 23. Slytherin. ISFP. English philology student. Lots of anxiety. From Bulgaria. 
They're burning all the witches, even if you aren't one...
... So light me up!
Harry Styles // Taylor Swift // Harry Potter // Sherlock // Dylan O'Brien // Marvel // still hung up over shows that ended // Absolute 100% Certified Dan Howell Trash.
I know. This Tumblr is a mess there is too many different things I am truly sorry for those of you who follow me for only 1 fandom.

tags: i want to go off on those ungratefull assholes in my life
but here I am listening to hs1 trying to calm down

summary: don't know just miss 1direction so much.
body:
don’t know just miss 1direction so much.

That boyband is the best boyband I’ve ever known and the thing that always makes me laugh is when I see their silly videos. And almost 85% of the contents of my laptop are of course their songs, videos/movie and photos. Another special for Harry Styles haha, I really miss them.

title: Numinous
body:
An OC Harry Potter Fanfiction

Prologue

The corridors were all dark, only to be lit by the occasional floating candle, or the tip of the workmen’s wands. The halls had a musty scent to them, mixed with the pungent burnt smell leftover from…

title: Deviprya
body:
She found my love and kept it safe from the world.

Chapter Three

AmyntaHarry took me back to his home, and I now sat on his kitchen counter as he tended to the cut on my forehead. He had picked me up, and in a flash I was faced with a tall house. It was three…

summary: Ooooh can we have sneaky peeky of the new writings
question: Ooooh can we have sneaky peeky of the new writings
answer:
Considering I failed you all last night because I had a last minute change of plans, then here’s a sneak peek. If I can chip away at it, then it’ll be up tonight! 

***

He was glad that the kitchen was empty as it gave him a moment to gather himself and his thoughts. He knew he was probably taking a little longer in the kitchen than he actually should, but he didn’t know if that was something he decided to do on purpose to test if you would check on him. Some last ditch attempt to swell his ego before he bottled it and chickened out, heading for the door and leaving early.

You did, check on him that is. Standing in the doorway and finding him, alone, pissing about with the bottle opener which he couldn’t quite get the hang of. All fingers and thumbs as he worked himself up about you.

“Harry,” you grabbed his attention, after watching him for a while, causing him to look over his shoulder at you seeing where you stood in the kitchen doorway. This was the first time he’d had a proper chance tonight to admire you, you the same with him.

You took in his silk shirt and black trousers. Black shoes on his feet that gleamed even in the soft spotlights of the kitchen. “Everything okay?

The shadows that lined his face highlighted his prominent cheekbones and the way his dimples dented into his cheeks somewhat even more so when he was trying to fight a smile.

“Yeah,” he scoffed out a slight a laugh through his nose turning back before continuing to try to figure out how to open this fresh bottle of white wine.

Again, he chuckled under his breath, “Actually, could use a hand.”

The minute the words left his lips he was trying not to think about how they could be misconstrued cause he could definitely use a hand in that way too but my god he’s wasn’t going to correct himself. He was going to let it slide. He was going to hope you picked up on the innuendo that was unintended cause the way your legs looked tonight, he wanted nothing more than for them to be slung over his shoulders or wrapped loosely around his waist as you ravaged each other in the middle of his bed, or yours. He wasn’t fussed.

There was a charged energy between the two of you as you approached him, curling around his back to reach for the corkscrew. His hands easily giving in and falling lax as you touched them.

He tilted his body to the left, slightly showing you his chest and the way his shirt was no where near enough fastened. You looked at him from the corner of your eye when you heard him mumble, “I think I’ve broken it.”

“You haven’t, don’t be silly,” you responded. “It’s just cheap.”

He laughed at that, probably stronger than he should have. “You’d think that having been the host of the Breakfast Show not too long ago, Nick would’ve picked up a better wine opener than a supermarket’s own brand.”

“Should’ve brought my electronic one that does it for you-“

You made this noise, that went very high pitched, and sounding like a “oooh”.

“Get you,” you joked, “Someone’s showing off.”

“Not really,” he wrinkled his nose. “‘M jus’ lazy. Does it for ya, dun’it?”

“Picked that up from Waitrose did ya-“

“Piss off,” he mumbled, causing you to laugh and wrinkle your nose at him this time.

title: Literal Amnesia
body:

Chapter 3

Laney’s POVThey have fluids running through me. I’ve had ct scans blood tests and other tests I will probably never know the names of. No one’s giving me many answers,although I’ve been…

From YouTube sensation to worldwide sensation…and I cant remember a thing.

Chapter 3

Laney’s POVThey have fluids running through me. I’ve had ct scans blood tests and other tests I will probably never know the names of. No one’s giving me many answers,although I’ve been…

Read more…

blog.title: o h s t y l e s

tags: i want to write a longer version of this
also i don't know why i ended it there
summary: Here’s a sad thought. Since SAAF y/n is probably the least liked when it comes to the fans, what is one day she gets mobbed...
question: Here’s a sad thought. Since SAAF y/n is probably the least liked when it comes to the fans, what is one day she gets mobbed while out with Harry (I know Paris is infamous with that) and she freaks out and Harry just thinks that that’s it. She’s not going to want to stay with him and deal with that anymore.
answer:
Since the very beginning, before anything was made official, he’s warned her about the repercussions of being seen near him, but she just rolls her eyes and tosses her hand through the air with a little wave. 

“Oh, Harry… You silly, little boy. Do you really think they’ll try to do me such harm with those big, strong men you hired for me standing guard?”

She’s laughing then, but what she doesn’t know is 37 days from that exact conversation, you would be grabbed, tossed and thrown in a matter of a few seconds, enough time to show you what literal scum you are. 

It was just a walk from the car to the hotel doors, but maybe his mistake was having you walk behind him, out of his sight. 

What first grabs his attention is the feel of a body slamming against his, grabbing onto his coat for support and then suddenly being torn away. The yelling, a kind much different than from moments ago, erupted and the bodyguard who was standing at the door, rushed passed him without a second thought. 

You’re laying down on the pavement, and all you can see are people’s shoes, but you remember hearing a voice just above everyone else’s that repeated, “Larry is real, bitch!”

“Get the fuck out of her face!”

“Nasty cunt! Go fucking die.” Spat. 

Within a few seconds you were lifted and set back down on your feet, and guided into the foyer of the hotel where the lights hit you just as hard as before. You were put into the elevator, and it’s when your reflection hit the surrounding walls that you noticed the blood trailing like snake down passed your eye. 

“The police are on their way.”

“She needs medical attention.”

“She could have a concussion.”

All the words flew passed you, but you were left transfixed on your reflection, and despite it all, you immediately thought of the music video for Everytime by Britney Spears, and realized being attacked by fans isn’t as glamorous as they made it out to be. Pain came with it. Humiliation. A lot of pain. 

“My head hurts.”

“I know, baby - we’ll get it taken care of, okay?” And it’s then, when you finally look at Harry, do you see his eyes pooling over with tears. “I’m so sorry - this is my fault - I’m so sorry.”

“Britney Spears is a liar…”

“Wh–?”

“She hit her head pretty hard, mate. She’s probably in a whole other word right now.”
